reviewtext: I got this radio to replace two Sony ICF-S10MK2 that seemed to find themselves a better home so i tried a different brand every bit as good as the Sony's same price too i listen mostly to talk radio Tried headphone radios did not like things in ears uncomfortable quickly can't go wrong with this gem hopefully it will stay around for awhile battery life great i have dropped many times has not missed a beat maybe i should get another one.
